landing_page.welcome1: Welcome to the Sector Hungaricus website!
landing_page.welcome2: Our community is Hungary’s largest self-organized, store- and club-independent wargame skirmish group. You can find more information about the games we play below. By browsing our event calendar, you can discover beginner-friendly events, club days, and tournament dates. Join our Discord servers to chat with the community about games and hobby-related topics!

killteam.title: Warhammer 40K - Kill Team
killteam.description: Action-packed tactical skirmish combat in the war-torn 41st Millennium

spearhead.title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar - Spearhead
spearhead.description: Play fast, fun games of Warhammer Age of Sigmar using the Spearhead game type – with just one box of miniatures per player!

warcry.title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar - Warcry
warcry.description: Fast-paced Skirmish Battles in the Mortal Realms

trench_crusade.title: Trench Crusade
trench_crusade.description: Trench Crusade is a skirmish-scale tabletop miniatures game that will plunge players deep into a horrifying alternate timeline.

pc_games.title: PC Games
pc_games.description: Join our community and play together with us

intro.title: What is Kill Team?
intro.description: Kill Team is a fast-paced, skirmish-based tabletop game set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. Small squads of specialist fighters engage in tactical battles with evolving missions and dynamic rules. Perfect for newcomers to wargaming or veterans looking for quick matchups.

official_resources.title: Official Resources
official_resources.description: Explore the official resources for Kill Team:

map_packs.title: Map Packs
map_packs.description: Learn about official and community-made map packs for Kill Team games!

events.title: Events and Local News
events.description: Stay updated on upcoming tournaments, local events, and news about the Kill Team community!
